title: 15 dead, 47 injured in Mexico bus crash
description: Fifteen people are dead and 47 are being treated for their injuries after a bus carrying holiday season tourists flipped on a highway in Mexico’s Pacific coast

title: Benedict's brief papacy was marred by the priest sex abuse scandal
description: The priest sex-abuse scandal was the albatross around the neck of Pope Emeritus Benedict’s brief eight-year reign as leader of the Roman Catholic Church,

title: Pope Francis honors Pope Emeritus Benedict as 'a noble person' in homily
description: Pope Francis commented on the passing of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI during his homily and honored his predecessor as "a noble person, so kind."

title: Music and missile strikes: Ukraine rings in the New Year under Russian attack
description: Russian missile strikes hit Kyiv on Saturday as some sought to mark the New Year with parties and others remembered those killed in Putin's war.

title: 2022 was the year of drought
description: It was a year characterized by extreme drought. From North America to Africa to Europe to Asia, huge swaths of the planet were parched in 2022.

title: Timeline: Pope Benedict’s life
description: Read milestones in the life of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, who died on Saturday.

title: Former Pope Benedict XVI dies at 95
description: Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, the Bavarian-born theologian who suddenly resigned the papacy after just eight years, died Saturday, the Vatican said.

title: Brazil’s Bolsonaro lands in Florida, avoiding handover of power to leftist Lula
description: Outgoing Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro landed in Florida on Friday, less than two days two days before Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is set to take office.

title: Queen guitarist, women’s soccer team top U.K. honors list
description: Those at the forefront of the U.K.’s response to Russia’s war in Ukraine joined Queen guitarist Brian May on the country’s New Year’s Honors list on Friday.

title: Venezuelan opposition strips Juan Guaidó of ‘presidential’ role
description: For three years, Juan Guaidó led the Venezuelan opposition’s efforts to bring about new elections and remove socialist President Nicolás Maduro.

title: North Korea fires 3 missiles amid tensions over drone flights
description: North Korea fired three short-range ballistic missiles toward its eastern waters in its latest weapons display on Saturday, a day after rival South Korea

title: 13 giant panda cubs born in China make first public appearance
description: Thirteen panda cubs born at the China Giant Panda Protection and Research Center this year made their public debut at a breeding base in Chengdu.

title: Andrew Tate arrested in Romania on allegations of rape, human trafficking
description: Provocative social media influencer and former reality TV star Andrew Tate has been arrested in Romania as prosecutors say they have evidence that he ran an organized crime group involved in human trafficking. NBC News’ Ali Arouzi reports.
